nodes.text: Sergeant Rhea was a male Human Corellian Security Force officer, stationed in Coronet City. He was responsible for training CorSec starfighter pilots and assigning duty missions to them.

Sergeant Rhea was a NPC in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. Players who decided to join the neutral CorSec Squadron had to talk to Rhea to get mission assignments and learn new pilot skills.
